summary: Comprehensive testing of StudySmart Mega Prompt features completed. Fixed critical frontend bug (Select.Item empty value). All backend APIs (29/29 tests passed) and frontend UI flows working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor.impact: Non-standard REST response, functionality works correctly

minor.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor.impact: Non-standard REST response, functionality works correctly

bugs_fixed.issue: Select.Item with empty string value causing runtime error when opening Add Task dialog
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed value='' to value='none' and updated onValueChange handler

action_items: Minor: Update POST endpoints for group messages and group goals to return 201 status code instead of 200
critical_code_review_comments: Tasks.js: Fixed Select.Item empty value bug - was causing runtime error
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Multi-group system working correctly with v2 endpoints
Group chat with real-time message polling working
Group goals with contribution tracking and progress calculation working
seed_data_creation: Test tasks, goals, groups, messages created during testing and cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Mega Prompt features tested and working. Fixed critical bug in Tasks.js (Select.Item empty value). Test user goaltest@test.com available. Multi-group system uses v2 endpoints (/api/groups/v2, /api/groups/{id}/join/v2, /api/groups/{id}/leave/v2). Group chat polls every 3 seconds for new messages.

features: Timer presets (Classic 25/5, Extended 50/10, Short Burst 15/3, Deep Work 90/20)
Group chat - send and receive messages
Members list with XP and streak
